content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generation at x=-9.5 y=-0.5
A new power generation setup has been built.
Consists of following entities:
- Offshore Pump at position `x=-9.5 y=-0.5`
- Boiler at position `x=-2.0 y=1.5` (fueled with coal)
- Steam Engine at position `x=6.5 y=4.5`
- Pipe Group connecting the pump to the boiler (carrying water) starting near `x=-8.5 y=-0.5`
- Pipe Group connecting the boiler to the steam engine (carrying steam) starting near `x=-3.5 y=1.5`
- Small Electric Pole at position `x=6.5 y=6.5` (Currently not powered, status: NORMAL)

### Iron Ore Mining and Smelting at x=15.5 y=70.5
This setup extracts iron ore and smelts it into iron plates. It is currently not powered.
Consists of following entities:
- Electric Mining Drill at position `x=15.5 y=70.5` (outputting to furnace)
- Stone Furnace at position `x=16.0 y=73
